summary: TestSubject follower for Re-working Sword of Septim quest, do whatever u like to her (means modify)
descriptionHtml:
Who is Leva Faustus?

She skilled in Onehanded,Blocking and Twohanded fighting Style.

-------------------

Can she Teach?
I made a Fraction for it, but seems doesnt work, maybe later.... (shes twohanded teacher)

---------

Do i need some Files to get work?
Nope, Leva ist made by natural Skyrim, i didnt put custom hairs etc, the face explains how she looks on my game, in your game she might look differently (but im not sure about that)


---------------------------
About my Quest:

1. Sword of the Septim gets Renamed into Sword of Titus Mede II
2. Quests gonna begin in Whiterun
3. New Companion (maybe) [Leva test subject lol]
4. I try to Construct an own custom Dungeon for Quests
5. After you complet the Custom dongeon your Campaign begins @Dark Brotherhood...
6. Spoiler; You have to Kill Titus Mede II if you kill him on your quest on dark brotherhood then you find in his carpin a noble treasure which contains......
7. Quest gets Translated in German and English, i try to speak all character myself 

Heavy Armor of Titus Mede II
Heavy Gauntlets of Titus Mede II
Heavy Boots of Titus Mede II
Heavy Helmet of Titus Mede II
Holy Thunder Sword of Titus Mede II

That set give your incredible stats...

\"Are you proud to killed the Emperor Titus Mede II?\"

Well for that quest you should have do the dark brotherhood questline, because my quest is like you search for his equipment because you heard from somewhere its extrem worth it!



well thats all, Leva was just an Test-Subject, you can modi her as much as u desire because she don\'t comes to my final Quest as Follower.


if you modified her credit me.
author: bardockssj
